author: sichen
msg: OFBIZ-433 and OFBIZ-438: Allow PAID -> READY status for invoices.  Set the invoice.paidDate to now if none specified when status set to PAID.  Clear paidDate when status set to READY.  Thanks to Ashish Vijaywargiya.
